mapper.select: SELECT w. DONATEWRITE_NUMBER, DONATEWRITE_TITLE, DONATEWRITE_STATUS, DONATEWRITE_DATE, DONATEFILE_NUMBER, DONATEFILE_NAME, DONATEFILE_UPLOAD_PATH, DONATEFILE_UUID FROM TBL_DONATEWRITE W JOIN TBL_DONATEFILE F ON W.DONATEWRITE_NUMBER = F.DONATEWRITE_NUMBER WHERE DONATEWRITE_STATUS = ${status}
